message: I'm being generous in this first round, Bob. I hope you'll accept!
Alice, my turn! This split seems fairer to both of us. Don't forget, the clock is ticking!
Bob, let's be reasonable. This is a fair split, considering the inflation we're both facing.
Alice, time is running out! Let's meet in the middle. This is my final offer.
Bob, this is my final offer.  I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I won't budge further.  Time is money, and we're both losing it!
